00049 class PrivateRandom {
00050 private:
00052      static const int kNumRand = 10000;
00053      
00055      static int sRandIndex;
00056 
00061      static long sRandNum[kNumRand];
00062 
00063 public:
00069      static inline void initRandomNumberArray() {
00070 #ifdef __win__
00071           srand(4711);
00072 #else
00073           srandom(4711);
00074 #endif
00075           for (int i = 0; i < kNumRand; i++) {
00076 #ifdef __win__
00077                sRandNum[i] = rand();
00078 #else
00079                sRandNum[i] = random();
00080 #endif
00081           }
00082      }
00083      
00098      static inline long privateRandomUniform() {
00099           return sRandNum[(++sRandIndex) % kNumRand];
00100      }
00101 
00102 
00103 };

00171 inline double RandomUniform()
00172 {
00173 #ifdef NORANDOM
00174      static bool firstTime =true;
00175      if (firstTime) {
00176           firstTime = false;
00177           slog << "---------------------- NO RANDOM ----------------------" << logEnd;
00178      }     
00179      return 0.5;
00180 #endif     
00181 
00182 #ifdef __win__
00183      double num = static_cast<double>(rand()) / kRandomMax;
00184 #else
00185      double num = static_cast<double>(random()) / kRandomMax;
00186 #endif
00187      return num;
00188 }
00189 
00201 inline double RandomUniform(double low, double high)
00202 {
00203      double num = low + RandomUniform() * (high - low);
00204      return num;
00205 }
00206 
00217 double Gaussian( double scale, double mean )
00218 {
00219 #ifdef NORANDOM
00220      static bool firstTime =true;
00221      if (firstTime) {
00222           firstTime = false;
00223           slog << "---------------------- NO RANDOM IN GAUSSIAN----------------------" << logEnd;
00224      }     
00225      return mean;
00226 #endif     
00227      double result = mean;   // NOTE:  default value of mean is zero.
00228 
00229      // Fast Box-Muller method:
00230      double U1, U2, V, W;
00231 //     static bool         stored = false;
00232      static double       save;
00233      static const double kFactor = 2.0 / double(RAND_MAX);
00234         
00235      if (GaussSaver::isSaved()) {
00236           result = save;
00237           GaussSaver::setSaved(false);
00238      }
00239      else {
00240           do {
00241                U1 = kFactor * RandomUniform(0, RAND_MAX) - 1.0;
00242                U2 = kFactor * RandomUniform(0, RAND_MAX) - 1.0;
00243                W  = U1*U1 + U2*U2;
00244           } while ( W > 1.0 );
00245                 
00246           V = sqrt( -2.0 * log(W) / W );
00247           result = U1 * V;
00248           save   = U2 * V; 
00249           GaussSaver::setSaved(true);
00250      }
00251                 
00252      result = mean + scale * result;            //      approximate Normal(mean,scale*scale)
00253 
00254      return result;
00255 }

00265 inline int Poisson(double lambda) {
00266      double U, f, cf, x;
00267      int    k, n, result;
00268         
00269      if ( lambda <= 0.0 ) {
00270           result = 0;
00271      }
00272      else if ( lambda < 9.0 ) {
00273           U = RandomUniform();
00274           f = exp( -lambda );
00275           if ( U <= f ) {
00276                result = 0;
00277           }
00278           else {
00279                cf = f;
00280                n = max( 5, int(lambda+3*sqrt(lambda)) );
00281                for ( k = 1; k < n; k++ ) {
00282                     f = lambda * f / k;
00283                     cf += f;
00284                     if ( U <= cf )
00285                          break;
00286                }
00287                result = k;
00288           }
00289      }
00290      else {     //      Use Gaussian approximation:
00291           x = Gaussian( sqrt(lambda), lambda );
00292           result = max( 0, int(x+0.5) );
00293      }
00294         
00295      return result;
00296 }
00307 inline double XPoisson( double lambda, double clip ) {
00308      double             U, f, cf, x,
00309           k, n, result;
00310      
00311      if ( lambda <= 0.0 ) {
00312           result = 0.0;
00313      }
00314      else if ( lambda < 9.0 ) {
00315           U = RandomUniform();
00316           f = exp( -lambda );
00317           if ( U <= f ) {
00318                result = 0;
00319           }
00320           else {
00321                cf = f;
00322                n = max( 5.0, lambda + 3.0*sqrt(lambda) );
00323                for ( k = 1.0; k < n; k++ ) {
00324                     f = lambda * f / k;
00325                     cf += f;
00326                     if ( U <= cf )
00327                          break;
00328                }
00329                result = k;
00330           }
00331      }
00332      else { //  Use Gaussian approximation:
00333           x = Gaussian( sqrt(lambda), lambda );
00334           result = max( 0.0, floor(x+0.5) );
00335      }
00336      
00337      return min( result, clip );
00338 }
00339 
00348 inline double Exponential(double mean)
00349 {
00350      return (-mean) * log(RandomUniform());
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00362 inline int probBySize(const double* sizes, int length)
00363 {
00364      double sum = 0;
00365      for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00366           sum += sizes[i];
00367      }
00368 
00369      double r = RandomUniform();
00370      double prob = 0;
00371      for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00372           prob += sizes[i] / sum;
00373           if (r < prob) {
00374                return i;
00375           }
00376      }
00377      return 0;
00378 }
